name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.build:
./claat export -o dist index.md && sed -i "" -e "/body/i\\
<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"css/style.css\">" dist/index/index.html
scripts.serve:
nodemon --watch index.md --exec './claat export index.md && sed -i "" -e "/body/i\\
<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"css/style.css\">" index/index.html && http-server index'
